target.name: Restart
target.query: SELECT time, timestamp as text FROM "actions" WHERE ("actionName"::tag = 'restartPlugModem') AND $timeFilter

description: A dashboard to display speedtest data over time.

targets.query: SELECT mean("bytes") FROM "download" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("bytes") FROM "download" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("bytes") FROM "download" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("round_trip_time_avg") FROM "pings" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/) AND success = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("round_trip_time_avg") AS "Latency" FROM "pings" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/) AND success = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "target"
SELECT mean("round_trip_time_avg") FROM "pings" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/) AND success = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("bandwidth") AS "Down Mbps" FROM "download" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("bandwidth") AS "Down Mbps" FROM "download" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("bandwidth") AS "Down Mbps" FROM "download" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("bandwidth") AS "Down Mbps" FROM "download" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/) AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Shows the avg speeds received by test site

targets.query: SELECT mean("bandwidth") AS "Download Avg" FROM "download" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "server_name", "server_location"
SELECT mean("bandwidth") AS "Upload Avg" FROM "upload" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "server_id"
SELECT mean("bandwidth") AS "Upload Avg" FROM "upload" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "server_id"
SELECT max("bandwidth") AS "Down Mbps" FROM "download" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/) AND $timeFilter

list.label: namespace
list.name: namespace
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM ping WITH Key = "namespace"

title: SpeedTests
